locational.title: Oh Deer!
locational.description: Find a deer in Richmond Park

locational.title: What's the time?
locational.description: Say 'bing bong bing bong' at the same time as Big Ben

locational.title: Boo KCLMS
locational.description: Boo King's College London Maths School

locational.title: Ride the cable cars
locational.description: Take a ride on the IFS Cloud cable car

locational.title: Not My King
locational.description: Protest the monarchy outside Buckingham Palace

locational.title: Royal Rings
locational.description: Eat 6 Haribo rings (or alternative) outside Hampton Court Palace

locational.title: Secret Agent
locational.description: Pose with sunglasses outside MI6 HQ

locational.title: Bon Voyage
locational.description: Wave to a Eurostar train and say 'Bon Voyage'. The train may be bound for London, Paris or Amsterdam, but it must be moving.

locational.title: Tyrant Lizard
locational.description: Roar at a T-Rex at the National History Museum

locational.title: Mathematician
locational.description: Solve a maths problem in the maths section of the Science Museum

locational.title: Perform at the O2
locational.description: Perform something at the O2 Arena

locational.title: Olympic Sprinter
locational.description: Race your teammate outside the West Ham Olympic Stadium

locational.title: Do something feminist on Waterloo Bridge
locational.description: Do something feminist on Waterloo Bridge

locational.title: Zero Degrees
locational.description: Cross the Prime Meridian on foot

nonlocational.title: Support the LGBTQ+ Community
nonlocational.description: Support the LGBTQ+ community in some way

nonlocational.title: Pretend to drive the DLR
nonlocational.description: Sit at the front of a Docklands Light Railway train and pretend to drive it

nonlocational.title: Masterwork
nonlocational.description: Go to a gallery and draw a picture of something you find there

nonlocational.title: It's coming home!
nonlocational.description: Play football at a football stadium. You may use anything as the ball.

nonlocational.title: Property Tycoon
nonlocational.description: Visit a property found on the standard Monopoly board. These include Old Kent Road, Whitechapel Road, `The Angel` Islington, Euston Road, Pentonville Road, Pall Mall, Whitehall, Northumberland Avenue, Bow Street, Marlborough Street, Vine Street, The Strand, Fleet Street, Trafalgar Square, Leicester Square, Coventry Street, Piccadilly, Regent Street, Oxford Street, Bond Street, Park Lane and Mayfair.
